pages.text: Stack your Ingots of Spirit Sakura Steel into a block, then smelt it in Furnace. With the baptism of fire, it turns into Sakura Pearl. Sakura Pearl contains amazing amount of Spirit Sakura Power which is extremely pure.$(br2)If used properly, with its great power, an ordinary human is able to drive the Devil into his or her Blade, making it a Bewitched Blade.
Combine your Blade and Sakura Pearl on an Anvil.$(br2)Then, your Blade will get Bewitched.
